name: The Last Hope (itch) (TheMasoud)
description:
Once upon a time when our planet still was beautiful and alive, something terrible happened.

A parasite almost destroyed everything on the earth.

There was no cure, No hope.

Our planet got deserted and just a few scary creatures survived.

But this was not the end of the story, Not yet.

In an abandoned lab, Under a dusty Microscope there was a tiny cell trying to survive.

And here the story of the hope begins.
